items.sentence: Do you have a toilet plunger I could borrow?
We should get out of here as fast as we can.
The question now is what should we be doing.
We're not going to just sit all day, are we?
Maybe we can sit at a table near the window.
A little knowledge can be a dangerous thing.
I'm more optimistic about our prospects now.
I wouldn't be that optimistic if I were you.
Tom told me to make sure that Mary was safe.
We've been playing music together for years.
We've been working together for a long time.
We're going to do everything we can to help.
We have a lot of things we need to do today.
We weren't sure about what you wanted to do.
We've got much bigger problems to deal with.
This is the biggest party I've ever been to.
This problem is much bigger than we thought.
This is the big break I've been waiting for.
Are you sure you don't have anything bigger?
It's much bigger than I thought it would be.
